element.name: Double-Bladed Scimitar
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The double-bladed scimitar is the signature weapon of Valenar elves. A haft of fine wood supports a long, curving blade on either end. Forged with techniques honed over centuries, these blades are strong, sharp, and remarkably light.

element.name: Special (Double-Bladed Scimitar)
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: If you attack with a double-bladed scimitar as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can use a bonus action immediately after to make a melee attack with it. This attack deals 1d4 slashing damage on a hit, instead of 2d4.

element.name: Weapon Proficiency (Double-Bladed Scimitar)
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
element.supports: Weapon, Martial, Melee, ID_INTERNAL_WEAPON_CATEGORY_MARTIAL_MELEE, ID_INTERNAL_DAMAGE_TYPE_SLASHING, ID_INTERNAL_WEAPON_PROPERTY_TWOHANDED, ID_INTERNAL_WEAPON_PROPERTY_SPECIAL, ID_WOTC_ERLW_INTERNAL_WEAPON_PROPERTY_SPECIAL_DOUBLE_BLADED_SCIMITAR

element.name: Kensei Weapon (Double-Bladed Scimitar)
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: You gain proficiency with the Double-Bladed Scimitar if you don’t already have it, and it is a monk weapon for you.

element.name: Alchemist Flask
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: An empty flask for experimental elixirs.

element.name: Experimental Elixir, Healing
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The drinker regains a number of hit points equal to 2d4 + the alchemist’s Intelligence modifier.

element.name: Experimental Elixir, Swiftness
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The drinker’s walking speed increases by 10 feet for 1 hour.

element.name: Experimental Elixir, Resilience
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The drinker gains a +1 bonus to AC for 10 minutes.

element.name: Experimental Elixir, Boldness
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The drinker can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to every attack roll and saving throw they make for the next minute.

element.name: Experimental Elixir, Flight
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The drinker gains a flying speed of 10 feet for 10 minutes.

element.name: Experimental Elixir, Transformation
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The drinker’s body is transformed as if by the alter self spell. The drinker determines the transformation caused by the spell, the effects of which last for 10 minutes.
